item.title: The Autarchist Manifesto
item.description: “We do not seek chaos, nor submit to imposed order.” “We build inner harmony and radiate it as a quiet force.” 1. We are not anarchists. We are not statists. We are autarchists. We embrace personal sovereignty without domination or submission. 2. Autarchy begins within. Self-mastery is the source of external freedom. There is no liberty without responsibility. 3. Consent is sacred. All systems rooted in coercion are illegitimate.

Types include: 🌀 DAOs (Decentralized Autonomous Organizations) 🤝 Cooperatives & Collectives 🛖 Ethical Refuges & Retreat Spaces 🧪 Lab-like Projects or Pop-up Guilds ✦ Tools of Autonomy Aragon — DAO Framework Coordinape — Reputation-Based Compensation Gnosis Safe — Shared Custody & Multisig Discourse — Forums IPFS — Decentralized Hosting ✦ How to Start Define the field you want to serve (food, ethics, tech, care) Choose the structure (solo, guild, DAO, co-op) Use tools that match your ethos Publish your mission and be visible Invite aligned people — no permission needed You don’t “open a company” — you ignite an alignment.
